The Anti-DDoS also covers the gaming protocols such as Counter-Strike (1.6/Source/GO), Teamspeak, SA-MP and many more. Also the learning mode is activated so if some attack has a signature which is not in our DB, it will be learned by the Anti-DDoS and mitigated successfully.
